<<<<<<< HEAD
A brief treatise vpon the first table of the lavve, orderly disposing the principles of religion, whereby we may examine ourselues. / Written by Maister Dudley Fenner, minister of the Gospel. Fenner, Dudley, 1558?-1587.
[55] p.
Imprinted by Richard Schilders, At Midlebrugh : [1588?]
Publication date conjectured by STC. Part 2, "The groundes of religion necessarie to be knovven of euery one that may be admitted to the Supper of the Lord" has a separate dated title page. Part 2 formerly STC 10773; identified as STC 10773 on reel 1096:15. Signatures: A-C8, D4. Imperfect: part 2 only at reel 1096:15; cropped, with loss of text. Reproductions of the originals in the British Library (reel 1096:15) and Folger Shakespeare Library (reel 2115:7).
=======
A brief treatise vpon the first table of the lavve, orderly disposing the principles of religion, whereby we may examine ourselues. / Written by Maister Dudley Fenner, minister of the Gospel. Fenner, Dudley, 1558?-1587.
[55] p.
Imprinted by Richard Schilders, At Midlebrugh : [1588?]
Publication date conjectured by STC. Part 2, "The groundes of religion necessarie to be knovven of euery one that may be admitted to the Supper of the Lord" has a separate dated title page. Part 2 formerly STC 10773; identified as STC 10773 on reel 1096:15. Signatures: A-C8, D4. Imperfect: part 2 only at reel 1096:15; cropped, with loss of text. Reproductions of the originals in the British Library (reel 1096:15) and Folger Shakespeare Library (reel 2115:7).
Richard Schilders
